page.title: 17SUPERNATURAL FOLKLORE
page.content: These are two local{ghost}stories. One is of a frightened scout troop and the other about a curious phantom tramp - Both are chillers!In the middle of one June a scout troop went to Pinstent Camp near a place called the Masts. The troop made a totempole. The next morning they found the totempole had gone.It had completely disappeared.The scouts were very disappointed and decided to make a search.One scout was left behind. A little way out the scouts heard a terrible scream. They rushed back to camp and found,to their amazement, the totempole had reappeared, whilst on the ground was the scout looking dazed and confused. The Sarum Road, close to the golf course, is{haunted}by a tramp who crawls and murmers "Food - any money?" As he crawls he seems to bow three times. On the third bow he vanishes!
